modName: BB Luxury Suite Bed strip nude animation
summary: BB Luxury Suite mod's Bed animation that strips a NPC on player's owned beds.
descriptionHtml:
Thank you for taking time to download and endorsing this mod.
SkyrimSE version is available [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17349]here[/url]﻿.

[heading][color=#00ffff]What is this mod[/color][/heading]
The BB Luxury Suite mod has the bed animation that strips a NPC when he/she uses a bed from the BB Luxury Suite.  When the NPC exits the bed the same animation re-equips the armor.  This mod added the same animation to the following player owned properties.
[list][*]Whiterun Breezehome and Jorrvaskr Basement
[/*][*]Riften Honeyside[/*]
[*]Solitude Proudspire Manor[/*]
[*]Winterhold ArchMage Quarters[/*]
[*]Markarth Vlindrel Hall[/*]
[*]Dawnstar Sanctuary[/*]
[/list]
This also added three doors in the basement for fast travel to the following area.
[list][*]Dawnstar Windpeak Inn[/*]
[*]Falkreath Dead Mans Drink[/*]
[*]Rorikstead Frostfruit Inn[/*]
[/list]
The BB Luxury Suite basement lights have been enhanced to light the area better.  This also fixed the Solitude Proudspire Manor's HouseCarl room lights and bed.

[heading][color=#00ffff]Credits[/color][/heading]
Bethesda for Skyrim and CreationKit
[size=2]Migal for [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11427]Bathing Beauties or Beefcake - Luxury Suite[/url]

[heading][color=#00ffff]Mod Order[/color][/heading]
This mod requires the BB Luxury Suite mod's BBLuxurySuite.esm file, so please make sure this mod is activate after it.  If you have any light mod such as the EnhancedLightsAndFX mod, please activate this after it to allow this mod's Solitude Prodspire Manor HouseCarl room fix.

[heading][color=#ffff00]Incompatibility[/color][/heading]
All incompatible mods from the BBLS mod won't work with this mod including the See You Sleep mod.  Please examine the BBLS mod's Incompatibility list before reporting issues.
author: Skysan4298
